text: Allahale ti manisaharusamga matra timila'i mitrata garnubata manahi gardacha, jasale timisita dharmako barema lada'i gare, ra timila'i timra gharaharubata niskasita gare ra timro niskasanama aruko sahayata gare. Tasartha juna manisaharule yasta manisaharusamga mitrata garchan, tinai atyacari hun
